title: Cum For The Viking 4
description: The sins of the flesh...Having been thoroughly seduced and corrupted by lusty Vikings, Lady Charlotte Abbot and her sister, Emma, are reunited with their parents, as they hide in a monastery. But the invasion is far from over, and a second threat materializes from the sea, bringing with it King Randver Gunnlaug and a fresh contingent of marauders bent on pillaging, sacking, and ravishing virgins.This story contains erotic romance, orgasm denial, anal play, oral sex, and spanking. All characters are eighteen and above. Adult 18+
author: Virginia Wade
